text: Is it possible to access a properties value history via hubl?

Is there a way to integrate "smart rule" in our module using hubl or hubdb or overwrite the "lead form" styles exit pop-up is the only alternative? Reason is I created a custom exit pop-up and I want to exclude particular "list" in HubsPot seeing our exit pop-up. We just want to target new visitors.
Not that I'm aware of... Depending on the use-case, you may be able to build a serverless function to get that data from the contacts API and return it via AJAX.

Is it possible when coding a landing page template, to disable the "common modules" available when building a page with said template? Im building a custom flexible column template with an assortment of custom built modules. I'd like to disable when using this template any default HubSpot modules.
how can I limit the number of items being displayed in my module?  - i need a max of 3
